protocol.name: P-AFFY-2
protocol.text: Labeling of samples was carried out according to the manufacturerâ€™s standard protocol

protocol.name: P-MTAB-15813
text: Total RNA was extracted using TRIZOL reagent, treated with DNaseI (Ambion), and column purified with an RNeasy MinElute CleanUp kit (Qiagen).

protocol.name: P-MTAB-15814
protocol.text: For Arabidopsis, 1/3 of the bottom part of stems of Atwrky12-1 and Atwrky12-2 homozygous plants and Columbia wild type plants were used.

protocol.name: P-MTAB-15815
protocol.text: The normalized data was obtained by using RMA. All chips were normalized together using robust multichip average.  Median polish was used for the probe level summary.

protocol.name: P-MTAB-15816
text: Arabidopsis thaliana wild-type Col-0 and T-DNA insert lines were grown in growth chambers at 22 oC under long day condition (16 hrs light). Stems of 45 days old plants were used for all experiments.
(Parameters: start time = 45, time unit = days, min temperature = 22, temperature unit = C, media = Potting soil mix)
